results.title: Lipid Accumulation in Hearts Transplanted From Nondiabetic Donors to Diabetic Recipients.
results.text_hl: We evaluated cardiomyocyte morpho-pathology by seriated biopsies of healthy implanted hearts in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ recipients during 12-month follow-up from @<m>DISEASE_605376</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:605376 @@@HTX@@@. Because @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduces @DISEASE_Pneumonia_Lipid @DISEASE_MESH:D011017 @@@ectopic lipid accumulation@@@, we evaluated the effects of the drug in a nonrandomized subgroup.

citations.NLM: Marfella R, Amarelli C, Cacciatore F, Balestrieri ML, Mansueto G, D'Onofrio N, Esposito S, Mattucci I, Salerno G, De Feo M, D'Amico M, Golino P, Maiello C, Paolisso G, Napoli C. Lipid Accumulation in Hearts Transplanted From Nondiabetic Donors to Diabetic Recipients. J Am Coll Cardiol. 2020 Mar 24;75(11):1249-1262. PMID: 32192650
